title: ‘Ethereum could flip Bitcoin’ like Wall Street flipped gold: Tom Lee
contentSnippet: BitMine’s Tom Lee says that Ethereum will eventually flip Bitcoin’s market cap, which is almost five times smaller currently.

title: ‘ETFtober’ gets bigger, more than 5 new crypto ETFs filed this week
contentSnippet: VanEck's Lido staked Ethereum ETF and 21Shares’ leveraged Hyperliquid fund were among the ETFs that reached the SEC's desk this week amid a government shutdown.

title: Binance Cleared to Acquire Korean Crypto Exchange GOPAX
contentSnippet: South Korea has approved Binance’s acquisition of GOPAX, ending a two-year review and clearing the exchange to re-enter the Korean market.

title: Ghana central bank targets December to have crypto regulations in place
contentSnippet: It’s estimated that over 3 million people in Ghana, representing roughly 8.9% of the country’s 34 million population, use crypto in some form.

title: コインベース、ステーブルコイン決済プラットフォームを開始　USDC保有で年利4.1%
contentSnippet: コインベースが企業向けステーブルコイン決済プラットフォーム「Coinbase Business」を発表。USDC保有で年利4.1%、低手数料・即時決済でB2B決済の課題を解決。会計ソフト連携も対応。

title: Florida lawmaker reboots crypto reserve bill after the first one flopped
contentSnippet: Florida House Representative Webster Barnaby filed a new crypto reserve bill after the first one failed, but this time it isn’t a Bitcoin-only bill, and stricter compliance measures have been added.

title: Tough year for blockchain gaming, but there’s a ‘shimmer of hope’
contentSnippet: Blockchain gaming has faced a challenging year for funding, according to DappRadar, but a Q3 uptick brings hope, while recent game releases could turn the tide.

title: ユニスワップがソラナ対応開始、非EVMチェーン初の統合実現
contentSnippet: ユニスワップが非EVMネットワークとして初めてソラナに対応し、ウェブアプリでSOLトークンの直接スワップが可能になった。100万以上のトークンにアクセスでき、今後はブリッジングやクロスチェーン機能も予定している。

title: Bitcoin Falls as Short Sellers Pile In, Even as Spot Buyers Step Up
contentSnippet: Analysts see continued volatility for Bitcoin as short sellers dominate derivatives while spot buyers provide fragile support.

title: ビットコイン価格モメンタム弱まるも、クジラの買いは堅調＝CryptoQuant
contentSnippet: CryptoQuantが仮想通貨ビットコイン市場の近況を分析。短期的な上昇の勢いが弱化しているがデータは大口投資家の買い増しを示唆していると指摘。上昇再開の水準などを分析した。

title: Gold market cap soars to $30T, dwarfing Bitcoin and tech giants
contentSnippet: The price of the gold has skyrocketed to a new all-time high, pushing its market capitalization to a new milestone, with analysts predicting Bitcoin could be next.

title: Ethereum attracted more than 16K new devs over 9 months
contentSnippet: New crypto developers are seemingly flocking to the Ethereum ecosystem, followed by Solana and Bitcoin, according to new data from Electric Capital.

title: Investors are getting better at spotting bad Bitcoin treasuries: David Bailey
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury firms have little reason to launch without a clear “edge,” a Bitcoin treasury executive says, as debate over a potential bubble intensifies.

title: ビットコイン11万ドルを割り込み続落、米中首脳会談控え市場の緊張高まる
contentSnippet: ビットコインは前日比2.39%安の108,800ドルに下落。トランプ大統領が中国との貿易戦争継続を認め、月内の米中首脳会談を控える中で市場に緊張感が広がっている。VIX指数は5カ月ぶり高水準に急騰し、地銀の融資問題も重なり市場心理が悪化。一方で金価格高騰を背景にトークン化された金の時価総額が34億ドルに達するなど、リスク回避の動きが鮮明となっている。

title: 米上場Zeta、ビットコイン決済で約350億円私募調達　SolvBTCトークン採用
contentSnippet: 米上場ZetaがBTC決済で2.3億ドル私募。SolvBTC採用により、ビットコインを受動的保有から利回り創出型の生産的資産へ転換する財務戦略となる。

title: リップル、XRPトレジャリー設立で1500億円資金調達を主導
contentSnippet: リップルがXRPトレジャリーのため10億ドル規模の資金調達を主導していることが明らかになった。SPAC経由で資金を調達し、XRPに特化した最大級のデジタル資産保有企業を設立する計画だ。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Are Crypto Traders Ready for a Gold Market?
contentSnippet: Data from Hyperliquid shows that the market has been caught flat footed in an environment where gold outperforms BTC.

title: 仮想通貨IEO投資の稼ぎ方　成功事例一覧と今後の予定、参加方法とは｜2025年版
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）投資で公募価格の数倍もの高値付けることもある国内外のIEO事例ですが、初値で公募割れしたケースもあるなどリスクも付き物です。今後の注目IEOにはナナメウエ社の「YAY」、NOT A HOTELの「NAC」をbitFlyerやGMOコインが販売検討しており、口座開設がおすすめです。国内外のIEO成功事例、参加方法まで解説。

title: ジャック・ドーシー「ビットコインをインターネット通貨に」　スクエア端末でBTC決済事例
contentSnippet: ジャック・ドーシー氏が率いるブロック社のスクエアで、仮想通貨ビットコインの決済事例が報告された。Compass Coffeeがビットコイン決済対応のスクエア端末を設置したとXに投稿している。

title: アーサー・ヘイズらがイーサリアムの年末1万ドル予想を維持、大幅下落後も強気姿勢
contentSnippet: ビットマインのトム・リー会長とアーサー・ヘイズ氏が、イーサリアムの年末1万ドル到達予測を改めて表明した。現在価格から142%上昇の見込みだが、歴史的平均は21%増に留まっている。

title: How Japan’s Crypto Insider Trading Ban Could Reshape Global Policy
contentSnippet: Tokyo’s legislative-first model creates a gravitational pull across Asia and beyond in a bid to clamp down on insider trading, observers say.

title: Bitcoiners push to bring BTC payments to Signal as privacy meets crypto
contentSnippet: Jack Dorsey and Peter Todd are among the Bitcoiners voicing support for privacy messaging app Signal to adopt Bitcoin amid a “Bitcoin for Signal” campaign.

title: コインベース、競合バイナンスのBNBを上場の計画　CZ氏は関連トークンの取り扱いも推奨
contentSnippet: 米コインベースが競合バイナンス関連の仮想通貨BNBを上場予定リストに追加した。CZ氏はBNBエコシステムの成長を背景に、他のBNBチェーン銘柄の上場も推奨している。

title: Bitcoin Bears Battle Critical Support Zone as BTC, Stock, and Gold Volatility Indices Surge
contentSnippet: The simultaneous rise in volatility across assets signals a widespread risk-off sentiment among investors.

title: Nasdaq-Listed Zeta Network Raises $231M via Bitcoin-Backed Private Placement
contentSnippet: Zeta's private placement funded in Bitcoin or SolvBTC, a wrapped Bitcoin token, is being touted as a means to strengthen its balance sheet.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Newsmax Reveals Bitcoin, Trump Meme Coin Treasury
contentSnippet: Publicly traded media outlet Newsmax is building a digital assets treasury centered on Bitcoin and the president's official meme coin.

title: Moon or Doom: Does Bitcoin Hit $100K or $120K Next?
contentSnippet: As Bitcoin hovers around $108K, prediction markets flip bearish while short-term indicators confirm what bulls don't want to hear.

title: U.S. Fed's Barr Catalogues Dangers to be Dodged in Future Stablecoin Regulations
contentSnippet: Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr, who was the central bank's regulatory chief during the Biden administration, flagged potential stablecoin pitfalls.

title: Why Is Dogecoin Down So Much Worse Than Bitcoin and Ethereum?
contentSnippet: Dogecoin remains the biggest loser among major crypto coins this week, shedding nearly a quarter of its value. Why's it down so bad?

title: Emerging 'Cockroaches' in TradFi Sting Bitcoin, but Fed Response Could Be Bullish
contentSnippet: Regional banks are sharply lower on credit worries on Thursday, pulling broader markets and bitcoin down alongside.

title: Daylight Raises $75M to Build Decentralized Energy Network
contentSnippet: The funding combines equity and project financing to connect DeFi capital with real-world electricity infrastructure

title: BNY Mellon Stays ‘Agile’ on Stablecoin Plans, Focuses on Infrastructure
contentSnippet: The bank isn’t committing to launching its own token — yet — but executives say it’s building systems that could support one if needed.

title: Myriad Moves: Traders Flip Bearish on Bitcoin, Favor Ethereum Over Gold
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include price predictions on Bitcoin, Solana’s chances of an all-time high, and Ethereum and gold racing to $5K.

title: Trump Family Has Already Made Over $1 Billion in Profit on Crypto, Says Eric Trump
contentSnippet: President Trump's family has already secured north of $1 billion worth of profits on crypto businesses, Eric Trump estimated, amid criticism over conflicts.

title: Coinbase Launches Stablecoin Payments Platform for Businesses
contentSnippet: Coinbase unveiled a business platform offering crypto payments, stablecoin yields, and accounting integrations for small and midsize firms.

title: Stellar Slides Late as Volatility Returns Despite Institutional Milestone
contentSnippet: WisdomTree introduces Europe's first physically-backed Stellar exchange-traded product amid heightened competition in digital payments infrastructure.

title: HBAR Faces Sharp Bearish Reversal After Volatile 24-Hour Trading Window
contentSnippet: Hedera’s HBAR token saw a dramatic 5% intraday swing as institutional investors drove heavy volatility, with early gains erased by late-session corporate liquidation pressure.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bearish October Continues as Altcoins Dealt Hammer Blow
contentSnippet: Crypto markets extended their steep losses Thursday as altcoins plunged and bitcoin tested key support, with derivatives data showing cautious sentiment amid fading liquidity.

title: The Rise and (Mostly) Fall of the PIPE Model in Bitcoin Treasury Strategies
contentSnippet: Once hailed as a fast track to bitcoin accumulation, PIPE financing now faces scrutiny as companies struggle with cratering share prices.
